text: NBC ’ s new sitcom “ Great News ” is something of a family affair. The Tina Fey - produced workplace comedy centers on Katie Wendelson ( Briga Heelan ), a 30 - year - old producer at New Jersey - based cable news show “ The Breakdown, ” whose overly involved mother, Carol ( Andrea Martin ), decides to take an internship at her daughter ’ s office. Its central mother - daughter story is based on creator Tracey Wigfield ’ s close relationship with her own mother, Kathy, who lives in Wayne, NJ, and whom she calls every day.
